Title: Ensures zoning lot mergers do not create any new non-compliance with applicable, pre-existing zoning regulations
Summary: Ensures zoning lot mergers do not create any new non-compliance with applicable, pre-existing zoning regulations for multiple dwellings in a city having a population of five million or more.
LawCode: Add ยง16, Mult Dwell L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the multiple dwelling law, in relation to ensuring zoning lot mergers do not create any new non-compliance with applicable, pre-existing zoning regulations
